job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Software Engineer, Frontend, Marketing Enablement
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join us on the Marketing Enablement Frontend team to help us achieve an ambitious vision for our Marketing Orchestration Product Group.

   The Marketing Enablement Frontend Team is responsible for making marketers work better, together. Our team builds user-facing products that span across HubSpot's entire Marketing Hub, such as Marketing Campaigns, interactive commenting, task management and so much more. With these tools, marketers can demonstrate their success to their teams and managers, and iterate to keep improving.

   As a Senior Frontend Engineer on this team, you will:
     * Write and ship production code that has meaningful user and business impact
     * Envision, build and analyse new features and tools, each contributing to company growth and revenue
     * Work with a small cross-functional team of engineers, PMs, designers, content designers, and researchers
     * Collaborate with HubSpotters all over the company, whether in engineering, product, design, research, marketing, sales, etc
     * Help HubSpot users meet their goals, via changes you've made
     * Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience
     * Get exposure to how HubSpot works as a business
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer, Frontend, Marketing Enablement

We're looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join us on the Marketing Enablement Frontend team to help us achieve an ambitious vision for our Marketing Orchestration Product Group.

   The Marketing Enablement Frontend Team is responsible for making marketers work better, together. Our team builds user-facing products that span across HubSpot's entire Marketing Hub, such as Marketing Campaigns, interactive commenting, task management and so much more. With these tools, marketers can demonstrate their success to their teams and managers, and iterate to keep improving.

   As a Senior Frontend Engineer on this team, you will:
     * Write and ship production code that has meaningful user and business impact
     * Envision, build and analyse new features and tools, each contributing to company growth and revenue
     * Work with a small cross-functional team of engineers, PMs, designers, content designers, and researchers
     * Collaborate with HubSpotters all over the company, whether in engineering, product, design, research, marketing, sales, etc
     * Help HubSpot users meet their goals, via changes you've made
     * Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience
     * Get exposure to how HubSpot works as a business

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on frontend software engineering for marketing enablement tools. While it mentions 'user-facing products' and 'business impact', it lacks any specific mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies and tasks. The core responsibilities and technologies described align with traditional software engineering rather than specialized AI/ML roles.

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly mentions writing and shipping production code, building user-facing products, and developing features, which are core software development activities.
Envisioning, building, and analyzing new features and tools is a direct software development responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: Envision, build and analyse new features and tools

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding the business context of marketing enablement and how features contribute to company growth and revenue.
job_tasks.phrase: each contributing to company growth and revenue

job_tasks.justification: Working with a cross-functional team (engineers, PMs, designers, etc.) requires collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with a small cross-functional team of engineers, PMs, designers, content designers, and researchers

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with people across the company in various departments is a key aspect of communication and collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with HubSpotters all over the company, whether in engineering, product, design, research, marketing, sales, etc

job_tasks.justification: Helping users meet their goals through software changes is a direct outcome of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Help HubSpot users meet their goals, via changes you've made

job_tasks.justification: Implementing experiments to gain insights into user behavior and improve their experience can involve A/B testing or other forms of data analysis and modeling, though it's not explicitly AI/ML.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience

job_tasks.justification: Getting exposure to how the business operates is a form of business understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: Get exposure to how HubSpot works as a business

soft_skills.phrase: Work with a small cross-functional team of engineers, PMs, designers, content designers, and researchers
Collaborate with HubSpotters all over the company, whether in engineering, product, design, research, marketing, sales, etc
Envision, build and analyse new features and tools
Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience
Write and ship production code that has meaningful user and business impact
